title: Generate a Condition-Based Maintenance Alert
description: A sensor on a machine has detected a vibration level that exceeds the predefined threshold, indicating a potential bearing failure.

tasks.description: Receive the real-time sensor alert with the vibration reading.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system automatically receives the alert from the condition monitoring sensor.

tasks.description: Automatically generate a medium-priority maintenance work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system creates a new work order to investigate the high vibration.

tasks.description: Assign the work order to the technician responsible for that area.
tasks.expected_outcome: The work order is automatically assigned to the correct technician's queue.
